attributes.action: make St Georges Day a bank holiday or give it the recognition it deserves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St Andrews Day (Scotland), and St Patricks Day (Ireland). Are bank holidays in their respective country's. Yet in England, St Georges Day is not. Most of the population do not know the date of St Georges Day. Pubs and other businesses celebrate St Patricks Day with offers, flags etc. Yet St Georges Day, there is nothing. Anyone opposing this, should first think that St Patricks Day is celebrated in England so why not the day of our own Saint? Please restore some English pride into the country that is rarely named outside of sport, as England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
